author: PA News Agency
title: Power now restored to all homes in Scotland affected by Storm Gerrit | Your Local Guardian
text: All homes that lost power as Storm Gerrit lashed Scotland have now been reconnected, bosses at power firm SSEN have confirmed. The electricity provider said its teams had worked through “particularly challenging conditions” to restore supplies to more than 48,000 homes. A final push by staff saw the last properties without electricity reconnected by 11pm on Friday, with customers in parts of Aberdeenshire, Perthshire and The Great Glen area in the Highlands all now with power again. Andy Smith, SSEN distribution’s operations director, said the storm had brought “serious disruption” with gale force winds having reached recorded speeds of 86mph in Inverbervie, Aberdeenshire and 84mph in Lerwick, Shetland. Mr Smith said: “Storm Gerrit caused serious disruption across the north of Scotland, and I would like to say thank you to our customers for their patience while we worked through some particularly challenging conditions to reconnect them, as quickly and safely as possible. “I’m very proud of the work undertaken by SSEN’s operational teams, and for being out at all hours and in all weathers to find and fix the faults over the past few days. “I would also like to extend my gratitude to our contract partners and fellow network operators for how they supported our response.” SSEN is now encouraging customers who were left without power to apply for compensation, depending on how long they were without electricity for. Completion of work to restore electricity supplies comes ahead of the latest weather alert, with a yellow warning for rain and snow having been issued for much of Scotland on Saturday. As a result of that Network Rail Scotland said speed restrictions will be in place on the West Highland Lines from 10am today until 9am on Sunday. Comments: Our rules We want our comments to be a lively and valuable part of our community - a place where readers can debate and engage with the most important local issues. The ability to comment on our stories is a privilege, not a right, however, and that privilege may be withdrawn if it is abused or misused. Please report any comments that break our rules. title: Vatican says Pope Francis' condition still 'critical'
text:
Vatican says Pope Francis’ condition still 'critical’
The Vatican said Pope Francis' health remained "critical" on Sunday, but he hasn't experienced any more "respiratory crises" since Saturday evening.

author: @UnioneSarda
title: Il Papa: fedeltà alla democrazia - L'Unione Sarda.it
text:
Città del Vaticano. Lancia un forte richiamo alla «fedeltà alla democrazia», papa Francesco, ricevendo in udienza le Acli a 80 anni dalla fondazione. Parlando della «fedeltà alla democrazia» come loro «tratto distintivo», il Pontefice rimarca che «oggi ne abbiamo tanto bisogno». Una sottolineatura significativa, alla vigilia della Festa della Repubblica e a una settimana dal voto per le Europee.
Il Papa rileva che «democratica è quella società in cui c’è davvero un posto per tutti, nella realtà dei fatti e non solo nelle dichiarazioni e sulla carta». Il suo riferimento è a «chi rischia l'emarginazione: i giovani, ai quali in particolare destinate le iniziative di formazione professionale; le donne, che spesso continuano a patire forme di discriminazione; i lavoratori più fragili e i migranti, che nelle Acli trovano qualcuno capace di aiutarli a ottenere il rispetto dei propri diritti». E infine «gli anziani e i pensionati, che troppo facilmente si ritrovano scartati dalla società. E questa è un'ingiustizia». Il servizio a queste persone «non deve soltanto restare nell'ambito dell'assistenza - avverte il Pontefice -, ma promuovere la dignità di ogni persona e la possibilità che ciascuno possa mettere in campo le proprie risorse e il proprio contributo».
Nell'udienza nell'Aula Paolo VI, davanti a seimila “aclisti” guidati dal presidente nazionale Emiliano Manfredonia e dall'accompagnatore spirituale, il gesuita padre Giacomo Costa, il Papa mette in evidenza il loro «stile pacifico, cioè da operatori di pace», e assicura che «in un mondo insanguinato da tante guerre, so di condividere con voi l'impegno e la preghiera per la pace. Le Acli siano voce di una cultura della pace - raccomanda -, uno spazio in cui affermare che la guerra non è mai inevitabile mentre la pace è sempre possibile, e che questo vale sia nei rapporti tra gli Stati sia nella vita delle famiglie, delle comunità e nei luoghi di lavoro». Secondo Francesco, «costruisce la pace chi sa prendere posizione con chiarezza, ma al tempo stesso si sforza di costruire ponti, di ascoltare e comprendere le diverse parti in causa, promuovendo il dialogo e la riconciliazione».
«Ho ottant’anni, siete un po’ più giovani di me», scherza Bergoglio, suscitando ilarità. E rileva che nelle Acli «è possibile incontrare santi della porta accanto che non finiscono sulle prime pagine dei giornali, ma a volte cambiano concretamente le cose, in bene».

author: Sky UK Limited
title: Thousands still without power after week of chaotic weather - and it's quite not over yet
text: UK weather: Thousands of homes still without power after Storm Gerrit Storm Gerrit brought chaos to roads, railway lines, airports, and ferry services nationwide earlier in the week - and the disruption isn't over as the new year beckons. Friday 29 December 2023 07:13, UK Thousands of homes are still without power after Storm Gerrit wreaked havoc across northern England and Scotland. The chaotic weather [has delivered everything from heavy snow to a damaging tornado](https://news.sky.com/story/uk-weather-tornado-hits-greater-manchester-and-thousands-still-without-power-in-scotland-in-wake-of-storm-gerrit-13038743), ruining many people's journeys home from Christmas festivities. Around 1,500 properties in [Scotland](https://news.sky.com/topic/scotland-5866) are still suffering electricity outages, with people in the northeast and Shetland among the worst affected. Scottish and Southern Electricity Networks (SSEN) hopes to restore power to the remaining households on Friday and welfare vans serving hot food and drink will be open to customers in the meantime. 'Absolute disaster' The storm is also still being felt in northern England and Wales. Stalybridge, Tameside, and Carrbrook in [Greater Manchester](https://news.sky.com/topic/greater-manchester-6937) are in a "recovery phase", local authorities have said, after they were hit by a rare tornado that toppled trees and damaged homes. The freak whirlwind was thought to have been caused by a supercell thunderstorm, and residents said it had left some homes looking like "an absolute disaster". Elsewhere, three men died after their 4x4 vehicle [was submerged in the River Esk, near Glaisdale](https://news.sky.com/story/yorkshire-three-men-die-after-4x4-plunges-into-river-13038772). In Wales, 36,000 properties were left without power after lightning struck in Ceredigion. Travel disruption set to continue Storm Gerrit brought chaos to roads, railway lines, airports, and ferry services nationwide earlier in the week - and the disruption isn't over as the weekend beckons. The Met Office has said the final days of 2023 will see more strong wind, rain, and snow, though there are no weather warnings in place. But the Environment Agency has 33 active flood warnings, meaning flooding is expected, covering rivers including the Severn and Ouse. Read more from Sky News: [Secretive spaceplane blasts off](https://news.sky.com/story/spacex-launch-secretive-us-spaceplane-launches-on-falcon-heavy-rocket-that-can-take-it-further-than-ever-before-13038935) [Thousands of drivers ignoring bans](https://news.sky.com/story/thousands-of-drivers-brazenly-ignoring-bans-with-one-caught-20-times-while-disqualified-13038937) [Teen surfer killed by shark was 'standout' talent](https://news.sky.com/story/khai-cowley-australian-teenage-surfer-killed-by-shark-was-standout-talent-13038938) ScotRail, LNER, Avanti West Coast and London Northwestern Railway are among the train companies to have told passengers they should check before travelling in the coming days. While many lines have reopened since the storm blew through, services could still be suspended or cancelled due to system faults and damage. The London Euston and Watford Junction lines are not expected to be fully online until the end of Friday, while Welsh train services are expected to be hampered until Monday. Ferries are also still expecting trouble, with journeys between Dover and France impacted by wind.

author: GastÃ³n Ninin
title: Minor DÃaz es presentado como nuevo entrenador de Guanacasteca
text:
Minor DÃaz es presentado como nuevo entrenador de Guanacasteca
El entrenador Minor DÃaz fue presentado de manera oficial como nuevo entrenador de la AsociaciÃ³n Deportiva Guanacasteca tras la salida del espaÃ±ol JosÃ© GarcÃa, quien dejÃ³ el cargo luego de una serie de resultados irregulares al frente del equipo.
DÃaz regresa a la instituciÃ³n de la Liga Nacional de Guatemala tras su paso durante el 2020 y 2021, en un perÃodo eclipsado por la pandemia de Covid-19. Ahora, tendrÃ¡ la oportunidad de hacerse cargo del equipo con la posibilidad de tener tiempo para trabajar y conocer a sus futbolistas por el parate de la fecha FIFA.
Guanacasteca atraviesa un momento difÃcil en el Torneo Clausura al ubicarse en la dÃ©cima posiciÃ³n con 13 unidades con tres victorias, cuatro igualdades y seis caÃdas. El desafÃo para DÃaz serÃ¡ reestructurar al equipo y mejorar su rendimiento en la recta final del campeonato.
JosÃ© GarcÃa y el conflicto con Johan Venegas
Uno de los principales problemas que enfrentÃ³ el exentrenador JosÃ© GarcÃa fue su tensa relaciÃ³n con Johan Venegas, la figura y goleador del equipo.
El delantero fue relegado al banco de suplentes en el partido contra Sporting San JosÃ© y luego no fue convocado en los duelos ante Puntarenas y Santos. Esto generÃ³ incertidumbre sobre su continuidad en el club.
Esta situaciÃ³n despertÃ³ el interÃ©s de otros equipos de Costa Rica, que comenzaron a seguir de cerca el caso del atacante. Sin embargo, con la llegada de Minor DÃaz, Venegas tendrÃ¡ la oportunidad de iniciar un nuevo ciclo y recuperar su protagonismo en el equipo.
AdemÃ¡s de resolver la situaciÃ³n del goleador, DÃaz deberÃ¡ trabajar en fortalecer el sistema defensivo del equipo y encontrar una identidad de juego que le permita escalar posiciones en la tabla.

author: Breitbart
title: Exclusive Photos — Marjorie Taylor Greene Campaigns in -2° Iowa Weather for Trump: ‘None of the Polls Matter’
text:
Freezing temperatures, wind, and snow did not keep Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) away from the Iowa campaign trail to motivate Republicans to caucus for former President Donald Trump, she exclusively told Breitbart News in a phone interview Monday afternoon.
Greene’s campaign stop in Fort Dodge will feature a meeting with several hundred Trump supporters highly motivated to get out the vote. “The big thing is to turn people out today,” she said. “We’re gonna get people fired up to come out and caucus for Trump.”
Trump, who received massive positive
polling on Sunday, is leading the Republican primary contest with historic numbers. Even the New York Times admitted “survey has almost nothing but good news for the former president.” But with freezing conditions on the ground, at negative two degrees around 1:00 p.m., Greene cautioned voters not to take a Trump win for granted.
“It’s being recorded all over the news and all over social media that President Trump has such a high lead in the polls, but none of the polls matter unless people turn out tonight to caucus for President Trump,” Greene said. “And so that is what we’re doing.”
Trump’s ground game in the state is nearly unstoppable, Greene said. It boasts 52,000 caucus commitments and well over 2,000 caucus captains, numbers that any presidential hopeful would covet.
The Iowa caucuses begin at 7:00 p.m. Central Time. Depending on the size of the caucus, results could come in less than an hour later, but for the larger caucuses it may take several hours before results are available.
Wendell Husebo is a political reporter with Breitbart News and a former GOP War Room Analyst. He is the author of
Politics of Slave Morality. Follow Wendell on “X” @WendellHusebø or on Truth Social @WendellHusebo.
The post
Exclusive Photos — Marjorie Taylor Greene Campaigns in -2° Iowa Weather for Trump: ‘None of the Polls Matter’ appeared first on Breitbart.

author: David Martínez Blanco
title: Llevaba años vendiéndose y era un éxito: Mercadona retira esta colonia que era una de las más famosas y costaba menos de 3 euros
text:
Llevaba años en venta y era un éxito: Mercadona retira esta colonia que era una de las más famosas y costaba menos de 3 euros
La cadena de supermercados de Juan Roig ha utilizado sus redes sociales para confirmar que este producto ya no estará disponible en sus lineales
Mercadona se ha ganado a pulso su lugar entre los supermercados favoritos de los españoles. Con una estrategia basada en la renovación constante de su catálogo y una apuesta firme por la calidad a precios competitivos, la cadena valenciana liderada por Juan Roig consigue fidelizar a millones de consumidores cada año. Sin embargo, esta misma dinámica de actualización también implica que algunos productos, incluso aquellos que se han convertido en éxitos absolutos de ventas, desaparezcan de las tiendas, generando sorpresa e incluso decepción entre sus clientes.
En esta ocasión, uno de esos productos icónicos ha sido retirado: el Agua de Colonia Fresca de Deliplus, anteriormente conocida como "Brisa". Esta fragancia llevaba una década conquistando a miles de hogares por su aroma fresco, su versatilidad y, sobre todo, su precio imbatible de apenas 2,65 euros por un frasco de 750 ml.
Este producto se había convertido en un básico diario para muchas familias, especialmente para quienes buscaban un aroma agradable, suave y refrescante a un coste asequible. Sin embargo, fiel a su estrategia de renovación constante de productos, la cadena valenciana ha decidido prescindir de esta referencia, dejando a sus fieles consumidores con la incógnita de si volverá a estar disponible en el futuro.
La noticia no ha tardado en circular por las redes sociales, donde muchos usuarios han manifestado su sorpresa y descontento. "Hace tiempo que no encuentro esta colonia en vuestros supermercados. ¿Seguís distribuyéndola?", preguntaba una clienta en 'X' (antes Twitter). La respuesta de Mercadona no dejó lugar a dudas: "Hola Isabel. Ya no la tenemos. ¡Anotamos tu interés en el producto!", confirmaron desde la cuenta oficial.
Fragancia de flores y frutas
El Agua de Colonia Fresca de Deliplus destacaba por su combinación de notas cítricas y florales. La fragancia se abría con chispeantes toques de mandarina, limón y pomelo, seguidos por un corazón de jazmín y lirio del valle, para finalmente asentarse en una base cálida de ámbar, almizcle y maderas suaves. Esta mezcla convertía la colonia en una opción ideal para el uso diario, especialmente tras la ducha o en esos momentos en que se necesitaba un extra de energía y bienestar.
Uno de los trucos más populares para alargar su duración era aplicar una pequeña cantidad de vaselina en zonas estratégicas como el interior de las muñecas o el cuello antes de pulverizar la colonia. Un pequeño gesto que multiplicaba la permanencia del aroma en la piel, logrando que su frescura nos acompañase durante horas.
Los trucos naturales para oler bien sin tener que usar fragancias ni perfumes
La retirada de esta colonia también subraya el desafío de Mercadona de mantener un equilibrio entre la innovación y la fidelidad de sus clientes. El supermercado lleva años apostando por una estrategia dinámica, renovando constantemente su catálogo para adaptarse a las nuevas tendencias de consumo. No obstante, cada eliminación de un producto querido recuerda que, a veces, esa estrategia puede dejar huecos difíciles de llenar.
Aunque el surtido de perfumería de Deliplus sigue siendo uno de los más valorados del mercado, esta retirada deja claro que no importa cuánto éxito haya tenido un artículo: en Mercadona todo está sujeto a cambios. Por ahora, los nostálgicos de esta fragancia tendrán que buscar alternativas, a la espera de que la cadena decida rescatarla o lanzar una nueva versión que logre conquistar nuevamente a los consumidores.
Mercadona se ha ganado a pulso su lugar entre los supermercados favoritos de los españoles. Con una estrategia basada en la renovación constante de su catálogo y una apuesta firme por la calidad a precios competitivos, la cadena valenciana liderada por Juan Roig consigue fidelizar a millones de consumidores cada año. Sin embargo, esta misma dinámica de actualización también implica que algunos productos, incluso aquellos que se han convertido en éxitos absolutos de ventas, desaparezcan de las tiendas, generando sorpresa e incluso decepción entre sus clientes.
Mercadona

author: 小浪财讯
title: 计算机ETF（512720）跌1.26%，半日成交额884.98万元|计算机_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，计算机ETF（512720）跌1.26%，报1.015元，成交额884.98万元。计算机ETF（512720）重仓股方面， 海康威视 截止午盘跌1.12%， 中科曙光 涨0.00%， 科大讯飞 跌0.55%， 金山办公 跌0.69%， 紫光股份 跌0.91%， 同花顺 跌2.55%， 浪潮信息 跌0.78%， 恒生电子 跌3.21%， 润和软件 跌1.81%， 润泽科技 跌1.27%。
计算机ETF（512720）业绩比较基准为中证计算机主题指数收益率，管理人为国泰基金管理有限公司，基金经理为艾小军，成立（2019-07-11）以来回报为12.93%，近一个月回报为-1.33%。
